title: Week 4 Studs & Duds + Pitts Mental Breakdown, Monday Punday - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/3
description:
Poor Andy! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a Week 4 review of the biggest studs and duds! Which dud performances are actually concerning? Which Week4 fantasy football studs will do it again? Plus, big injury news, Monday Punday, and Andy has a full Kyle Pitts-related breakdown! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 3rd, 2022.
